name: ventai-app
description: VentAI - Professional HVAC Calculation and Design Platform

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && venv/bin/pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.lint:backend: cd backend && venv/bin/python -m flake8 src && venv/bin/python -m black --check src && venv/bin/python -m isort --check src
scripts.format: npm run format:frontend && npm run format:backend
scripts.format:backend: cd backend/src && venv/bin/python -m black . && venv/bin/python -m isort .

author: VentAI Team
